message.content:
{"id": "124570", 
"title": "Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session", 
"description": "I am testing BIRT 2.0 RC2 and am running into a problem where the Preview option from the toolbar in the Web Viewer only shows the first report I opened in a session.", 
"OB": "When using BIRT 2.0 RC2 and opening multiple reports in a session, clicking on the Preview option from the toolbar in the Web Viewer always displays the first report that was opened.", 
"EB": "To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open the Sales Invoice report. 2. Click on the Preview button again. Actual Result: The Product Catalog report is displayed again instead of the Sales Invoice report. Expected Result: The Sales Invoice report should be displayed.", 
"SR": "The development team should investigate and fix the issue causing the Preview option to always display the first report opened in a session, instead of the currently selected report."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '124570', 'title': 'Bug 124570Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session', 'description': 'Bug 124570Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session ', 'OB': 'I am testing BIRT 2.0 RC2 and am running into a problem where Preview (from the toolbar) in the Web Viewer will only show the first report I opened in a session. ', 'EB': 'Open Sales Invoice and click on the Preview button again.Actual Result: You see the Product Catalog report again.Expected Result: You should see the Sales Invoice report. ', 'SR': ''}
